TopicTitle: I can't get out of the Mk1 Crew Cabin and back inside again

Articles.Content: I can't get out of the Mk1 Crew Cabin and get back in again. I have it between two ore tanks. When I get a kerbal out (the two in the thing are Harming and Barkin Kerman) they appear inside the ship, wedged between the cabin and an ore tank. I press the spacebar and he ends up on top of the ship (the ship is horizontal, it's a literal ship). I can't get him inside again because there's no door on the side of the cabin, the only entrance appears to be at the point the kerbal spawned at (marked by a green blob in the SPH). I had to reload a quicksave.
Have you tried to right click on the Crew Cabin? A window pops up and you can select the crew member and transfer them back to a pod with a hatch.
If you mean new crew cabin I thin you are supposed to transfer crew to part with hatch. Crew cabin is so small so It don't have one.
Oh. I'll use something else, then. Thanks.

Same issue http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138918-Stand-clear-Doors-Closing-%28Said-no-one%21%29

Came to the conclusion no ones impressed by it..they need to fix it quick
